20101226030713.000|20101226030714.000|CC1|THEIR TIME LIVING AT THE CHATEAU
20101226030714.000|20101226030716.000|CC1|SO, I THOUGHT THAT'S WHERE THIS 
20101226030716.000|20101226030716.000|CC1|CHARACTER WOULD LIVE.           
20101226030716.000|20101226030721.000|CC1|>> COMING TO THEATER IN 2012,   
20101226030721.000|20101226030724.000|CC1|"MAN ON A LEDGE," WHO'S PERCHED 
20101226030724.000|20101226030724.000|CC1|HIGH ABOVE THE STREETS OF       
20101226030724.000|20101226030726.000|CC1|MANHATTAN FOR DAYS ON END.      
20101226030726.000|20101226030728.000|CC1|>> IT'S GOOD.                   
20101226030728.000|20101226030729.000|CC1|IT'S VERY CHALLENGING.          
20101226030729.000|20101226030731.000|CC1|YOU NEVER GET USED TO IT.       
20101226030731.000|20101226030733.000|CC1|IT'S LIKE GOING ON A BOAT.      
20101226030733.000|20101226030735.000|CC1|YOU NEVER LOSE YOUR SEA LEGS.   
20101226030735.000|20101226030737.000|CC1|WELL, YOU NEVER LOSE YOUR

20101226032017.000|20101226032019.000|CC1|REQUIRED HER TO USE AN OXYGEN   
20101226032019.000|20101226032019.000|CC1|TANK.                           
20101226032019.000|20101226032021.000|CC1|ONLY THING THAT WILL SAVE HER IS

20101226032021.000|20101226032024.000|CC1|>> WHEN THEY TOLD ME, I WAS,
